name: Bill Steer
description:
'''William Geoffrey Steer''' (born 3 December 1969) is a British guitarist and co-founder of the [[extreme metal]] band [[Carcass (band)|Carcass]]. He is considered a pioneer and an essential contributor to [[grindcore]] and [[death metal]] due to his involvement in [[Napalm Death]] and Carcass, two of the most important bands of those genres. Presently he plays with [[Gentlemans Pistols]], the reactivated Carcass and appeared as a live second guitarist for [[Angel Witch]] from 2011 to 2015.

The style of Steer's guitar work on early Napalm Death releases has been described as a "frenzied, [[Distortion (music)|distorted]] blur".
